drawbridge@princess.name: drawbridge
drawbridge@princess.examine: The drawbridge is made of wood.  It leads into the castle.

in_tower_door@princess.desc[1]: The door has been closed to keep the cold out.
in_tower_door@princess.name: in_tower_door
in_tower_door@princess.examine: It is a very small door.  One would have to stoop to go through it.
in_tower_door@princess.desc[2]: The door is locked...you could be trapped up here!
in_tower_door@princess.desc[0]: The door to the tower stands wide open.

towershield@princess.name: towershield
towershield@princess.examine:
This shield looks like it has been through many battles.  It will protect
you from the greatest of blows!
towershield@princess.desc[0]: The magical Towershield has been left here.

out_door@princess.desc[1]: A great oak door bars your way into the castle.
out_door@princess.name: out_door
out_door@princess.examine:
The door looks big and heavy, and is made of oak.  It is meant to keep
intruders out.
out_door@princess.desc[2]: There is a great oak door behind the &+Cportcullis&* bars.
out_door@princess.desc[0]: Someone managed to open the door to the castle.

bones@princess.name: bones
bones@princess.examine: Looks like the last guests never left!

flags@princess.name: flags
flags@princess.examine:
&+WThese flags show the royal crest of the royal family: a big &+Yeagle
&+Wsoaring over &+Bblue mountains.

tile@princess.desc[1]: You notice that one tile on the floor looks out of place.
tile@princess.name: tile
tile@princess.examine: You look at the tile and notice that it is a little loose.
tile@princess.desc[0]: A tile has been pushed to one side.

flowers@princess.name: flowers
flowers@princess.examine:
These flowers display a variety of colors and types.  They range from red
to blue to gold, and there is a wonderful selection of roses and orchids.

chains@princess.name: chains
chains@princess.examine:
The chains hold the princess to the wall.  They look to be made of some
strange metal.  They probably can't be broken.

eternalsword@princess.name: eternalsword
eternalsword@princess.examine: The sword has an unusual glow to it...and it looks sharp!!
eternalsword@princess.desc[0]: The mighty EternalSword is sticking out of a stump.

plant@princess.name: plant
plant@princess.examine:
This beautiful red plant looks odd at first sight.  As you look at it, you
can see that it is very unique.  You remember from somewhere that the &+Rjuice&*
of these red plants, called winterglove, can heal all kinds of illnesses.
plant@princess.desc[0]: This plant looks shrivelled.  Someone squeezed all the juice out of it.

portcullis@princess.desc[1]: A portcullis bars the entrance to keep out unwelcome visitors.
portcullis@princess.name: portcullis
portcullis@princess.examine: The bars are made of strong iron to keep people out.
portcullis@princess.desc[0]: The portcullis has been lifted to reveal a door.

tower@princess.name: tower
tower@princess.examine: The tower is old and gray.  It looks like it reaches up to the sky!

throne@princess.name: throne
throne@princess.examine: This throne is made of pure gold with rubies set in it.

in_door@princess.desc[1]: The door is closed to keep intruders out.
in_door@princess.name: in_door
in_door@princess.examine:
The door is made of solid oak and is powerfully reinforced.  It would be
impossible to force one's way through it.
in_door@princess.desc[2]: The door has been barred from the inside.

out_tower_door@princess.desc[1]: You can't get into the tower while the door is closed!
out_tower_door@princess.name: out_tower_door
out_tower_door@princess.examine: There is a sign on the door that says &+RKEEP OUT!
out_tower_door@princess.desc[2]: The door to the tower has been locked and chained.
out_tower_door@princess.desc[0]: The door to the tower stands wide open.

table@princess.name: table
table@princess.examine:
The table is round and sturdy.  It is made of a rare wood and is so big
that only a King could afford it!  Looking under the table, you see a
little &+Clatch&*.  How odd.

stairs@princess.name: stairs
stairs@princess.examine: They are old crumbling stairs.  Be careful!  Don't fall!'

opening@princess.name: opening
opening@princess.examine: You see a nice big opening.  You could hide lots of things in here!
opening@princess.desc[0]: There is an unusual opening in the floor.

potions@princess.name: potions
potions@princess.examine:
These potions are made from lizard's tongue, bat's wing, and warts with
one eye.  They don't sound appetizing.

tapestries@princess.name: tapestries
tapestries@princess.examine: The tapestries are red with sapphires embroidered in the borders.

bushes@princess.desc[1]: Some bushes grow around the base of the tower.
bushes@princess.name: bushes
bushes@princess.desc[0]: The bushes have been burned away.

comb@princess.name: comb
comb@princess.examine:
The comb is gold-plated and has sapphires embroidered in it.  You may be
able to wear it.
comb@princess.desc[0]: A funny looking comb is lying in the dirt.

tapestries_2@princess.name: tapestries_2
tapestries_2@princess.examine: The sapphires are red with sapphires embroidered in the borders.

latch@princess.name: latch
latch@princess.examine: It's a funny looking latch.   It looks like it could be moved.

banners@princess.name: banners
banners@princess.examine: The yellow and blue banners are flapping in the wind.

death@princess.title: Cave of the Grizzy Bear
death@princess.description:
You walk into the cave, wondering what could possibly be in a bear cave
(besides a grizzy bear of course).  The first thing you notice is that
you're still alive for now.  Then you notice a strange growling from the
back of the cave.

courtyard@princess.title: The Courtyard
courtyard@princess.description:
You have entered a courtyard behind the castle.  It is quite peaceful
here.  You can hear birds singing in the trees.  The walk way is bordered
with beautiful &+Yflowers&*.  You see the deep, dark forest looming to the
south.

forest1@princess.title: The Forest
forest1@princess.description:
You enter a forest.  There are paths in every direction.  The northern
path leads back to the castle.  The other paths lead deeper into the
woods.

forest5@princess.title: The Forest
forest5@princess.description:
The path continues northward and southward.  In the distance you can see
mountains.  The trees become fewer and fewer as you continue down the path.

path2@princess.title: Winding Pathway
path2@princess.description:
You are walking down a long winding narrow path.  A large castle reaches
up towards the sky in the distance to the east.  But here, there is little
out of the ordinary.  The path is just sand, and not well travelled
either.

tower@princess.title: Upstairs In the Tower
tower@princess.description:
You have reached the top of the tower.  Everything here is dreary, and 
you can tell that this is the tower of an evil person.  Piles of &+Cbones&* and
horrible looking &+Cpotions&* are scattered all over the floor of the tower.
This looks like a terrible place to be!!

forest2@princess.title: The Forest
forest2@princess.description:
You are deep in the forest.  Maybe you took a wrong turn somewhere?
Nothing looks familiar.

forest3@princess.title: The Forest
forest3@princess.description:
You are deep in the forest.  Maybe you took a wrong turn somewhere?
Nothing looks familiar.

throne@princess.title: Castle Throne Room
throne@princess.description:
You walk into the throne room.  In the center of the room, you see a
throne.  The &+Ythrone&* is made of gold with gemstones embroidered in it.  On
the walls hang &+Rtapestries.

path1@princess.title: Sandy Pathway
path1@princess.description:
This path is covered in sand that has washed up upon the dirt track 
during a previous flooding.  The sand is relatively dry not holding onto
the tracks made by travelers.  The bend in the stream is to the north and
the sandy path winds further south.

entrance@princess.title: The Entrance to the Castle
entrance@princess.description:
You stand on a &+ydrawbridge&* looking at a majestic white castle.  Hanging
from the walls are yellow and blue &+Gbanners&*.  &+YFlags&* of the same colors are
waving in the wind.  You wonder who lives here; the castle looks
abandoned!

mountain@princess.title: On Top of the Mountain
mountain@princess.description:
You reach the top of the mountain.  A huge &+Ctower&* rises out of the ground!!
The air seems much thinner up here.

forest4@princess.title: The Forest
forest4@princess.description:
You continue along the path.  You notice that the trees have changed
colors from blue to green to yellow.  What a strange forest this is!!  The
path continues south.  An ominous growling comes from a cave to the west.

forest6@princess.title: The Edge of the Forest
forest6@princess.description:
As you continue down the path, you are able to see the mountains looming
in the distance.  There are fewer and fewer trees.  You hope to get out of
this crazy forest soon!!

hall@princess.title: The Great Hall
hall@princess.description:
You have now entered the Great Hall.  You look around only to discover
that it is deserted.  Red &+Rtapestries&* hang from the walls.  In the center
of the room you see a table.  Many kings have feasted at this &+Ctable.

downtower@princess.title: Inside the Sorceress' Tower
downtower@princess.description:
There is a sense of evil pervading this whole tower.  There is a case of
&+Cstairs&* going up, and you hear sounds coming from there.

gwendolyn@princess.name: gwendolyn
gwendolyn@princess.examine: She doesn't look happy to be so chained up.  Hopefully you can save her!
gwendolyn@princess.description: The lovely Princess Gwendolyn has been chained to the wall.

gizelle@princess.name: gizelle
gizelle@princess.examine: She looks at you and says &+C'Come to fight me, eh?  Let the fight begin!'
gizelle@princess.description: Standing in front of you is the evil sorceress &+RGizelle!

ffox@princess.name: ffox
ffox@princess.examine: Vixan is a shy fox.  She bats her eyes looking at you curiously.
ffox@princess.description:
&+CVixan, a pretty little fox with &+Bblue &+Ceyes is looking at you from
the bushes.

rabbit@princess.name: rabbit
rabbit@princess.examine: &+cPeter looks at you and wiggles his nose &+C*hello*.  &+cIsn't he so cute?
rabbit@princess.description: You see a cute little bunny wiggling his nose.

fox@princess.name: fox
fox@princess.examine:
&+cFoxy looks back at you with those piercing &+Ggreen &+ceyes.  He looks 
hungry.
fox@princess.description: Foxy Loxy is a cute little fox.

child@princess.name: child
child@princess.examine:
You see a little girl with brown eyes and brown hair.  She is wearing a
dull brown dress and a grey shawl.  Her appearance may look drabby, but
Rose has a big smile on her face.
child@princess.description: A small child is playing in the courtyard.

stephen@princess.name: stephen
stephen@princess.examine:
&+CKing Stephen &+wtells you &+W'Hello adventurer.  Come to save my daughter,  
&+Whave you? Well go ahead and try if you think you can.  Be careful of
&+Wshiny things!  Good luck!!'
stephen@princess.description: King Stephen is sitting on his throne, waiting for you.

bear@princess.name: bear
bear@princess.examine:
&+gThe hungry bear bares his teeth.  He looks at you with his &+Rblood red
&+geyes.  He looks like he hasn't eaten in weeks.  Run away while you still can!
bear@princess.description: Look out!  It's a hungry bear!
